channel.title: Kick a player
channel.description: Ok so I've been searching for this forever. So what I am trying to do is when a player is teleported to a certain place I want him to be kicked, Like disconnected and then reconnected. =p I am Currently using A PI base (Project Insanity) Please Help, I need some kind of like null to happen that nulls the player to Disconnect.

item.title: Kick a player
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

if(clana > 0) {
clanb = 1;
clana–;
if(clana == 1) {
for (int j = 0; j < playerEquipment.length; j++) {
playerEquipment[j] = 0;
getPA().movePlayer(3211, 3420, 0);
getItems().removeAllItems();
getPA().closeAllWindows();
getPA().closeAllWindows();
sendMessage(“You Have Teleported Home”);
skullTimer = 1;
getPA().requestUpdates();
clanb = 0;
getPA().requestUpdates();
}

	}

}

this is in client.class

Read full topic
